extendedInfo.description: CABIFY âYour high-end car with private driver at near taxi rates - On demand and advanced reservations1.	Request your vehicle with a couple of clicks. 2.	Track your vehicle as it approaches your pick-up location and communicate easily with the driver.3.	Safe and convenient payment through your credit card or Paypal. No need for cash. No extra charges, even the tip is included.4.	Introduce your payment details only once. When your journey finishes, we process your payment automatically  and email your receipt.We will give you an estimate of how much your journey costs before you confirm it. You can also check the rates for any journey in our website: www.cabify.com Cabify, unlike traditional taxis, does not apply any surcharges:No base fare.Pay per car, not per person.No extra charges for airport, train stations or luggage.Meter only starts after driver arrives to pickup location.No extra charges at night or during holidays.*****     *****     *****     *****      *****Available 24/7 in Madrid, Barcelona, Malaga and La CoruÃ±a (Spain), Lima (Peru), Mexico City (Mexico) and Santiago (Chile).If you need more info or want to learn about specials for companies, please reach us at info@cabify.com.*****     *****     *****     *****      *****DOWNLOAD OUR FREE APP AND FOLLOW US ON FACEBOOK AND TWITTER TO FIND OUT ABOUT ALL OUR PROMOS!SPAIN:        http://www.facebook.com/cabifyEs		https://twitter.com/cabifyCHILE:          http://www.facebook.com/CabifyCLhttps://twitter.com/Cabify_ChilePERU:           http://www.facebook.com/CabifyPeruhttps://twitter.com/Cabify_PeruMEXICO:      http://www.facebook.com/CabifyMxhttps://twitter.com/Cabify_Mexico

reviews.title: Muy buena
reviews.comment: Impresionado por el coche y el ch\303\263fer, repetir\303\251. Es cierto que es un poco m\303\241s caro que un taxi pero el servicio no tiene comparaci\303\263n!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: The best cab service in town
reviews.author: Federico Carranza-Kopper

reviews.title: great app, very bad in reality
reviews.comment: with the app ordering a nearby cab seemed to good to be true. the cab position was shown at camp nou which is about 3 km away from my pick-up location. great, i thought. ONE HOUR later the cab was still shown in the same position. had to cancel fair. never again! uninstalled.
reviews.author: Zabeth Baehren

reviews.title: Recomendable por su seguridad
reviews.comment: Buen servicio en general. Autos muy comodos. Choferes educados y su servicio de GPS muy bueno. El precio de hecho es por encima del Mercado, pero si quieres llegar seguro a tu destino, creo que lo vale.
reviews.author: Frank V\303\241squez

reviews.title: A must
reviews.comment: Aplicaci\303\263n imprescindible para olvidar el cl\303\241sico taxi y cambiarlo por una berlina premium con una atenci\303\263n y servicio de lujo por casi el mismo precio. Muy recomendable.
reviews.author: Pablo G.-Trespalacios

reviews.title: Est\303\241 bien.. Si eres el sr. Bot\303\255n!!
reviews.comment: Coste por minuto en el taxi 1,25\342\202\254, cargo m\303\255nimo de 15\342\202\254!!!! Imagino que por este precio me masajear\303\241n los pies durante el trayecto...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: My way to move in the city
reviews.comment: From now on I will use this service as my way of moving around the city!. App works awesome!
reviews.author: Ruben Gomez
